name: Terry
text: Another devil! Do you want to make a deal with me?

name: Devil
text: I'll take a heart, but you can get the ability to jump.

name: Terry
text: Can I think about it first?

name: Devil
text: Nope, once you've started talking to me, you've locked yourself in your deal

name: Devil
text: You can now jump. Good luck!

name: Devil
text: We've made a deal already. Go on your way.
